transcript:
Customer: Hello. 
Executive: Uh sir very good morning kaise ho aap?
Customer: Very good morning badhiya. 
Executive: Ji ji ji ji ji. 
Executive: Ayush baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji ji ji bilkul. 
Executive: Ji maine kaha sir jaise abhi portal mein check kar raha tha leads show ho rahi thi matlab ki kis time ka ye aapne bheja tha ki jisme leads nahi aa rahi hai bilkul hi.
Customer: Nahi ye to maine search karke bheja hua hai. 
Executive: Achcha search kar rahe hoge aap direct. 
Customer: Ha apne ha apne search kiya hai. 
Executive: Ab jaise ki ek dekho abhi ek hum pe abhi jaise 18 ghante pehle bhi aap recommended pe click karoge na to aapko dikhega self loading concrete mixer ho gaya self loading concrete mixer ho gaya self loading concrete mixer universal concrete mixer ho gaya self loading machine 4.5 ka ye lekin ye hamare product to hai hi nahi. 
Customer: Nahi ye product aapke nahi mai samajh gaya sir isme aapka jo major products hai mai bata deta hu asphalt karke hai ek bar asphalt karke search kare usme nahi dikh rahi inquiry aa rahi hai sir inki asphalt ki.
Customer: Nahi ek bhi abhi tak to ek bhi nahi aayi hai. 
Executive: Ek bhi nahi aayi. 
Customer: Ye sirf ye mini concrete mixer machine keh rahe wo bhi chhote chhote ki. 
Executive: Samajh gaya sir mai wo bhi itne door ki ja Gujarat tak ki abhi jitne machine bhi itne ka lekin jo humne product select kar rakhe hai uske regarding chahiye na wohi to. 
Customer: Nahi jo. 
Executive: Ji ji mai aap se keh raha hu jaise ki usme ek minute rukiye mai aapko na ek list bhej raha hu kuch product aise hue hai jisme humne leads to consume kar li hai but koi isme product ka addition nahi hai ek second rukiye ga.

Executive: Ye hai sir isko na agar hamara kam nahi hai isme ye kuch product hai. 
Executive: Chhe category hai dekhiye ek bar jara sir.

Customer: Self loading concrete mixer portable mixer. 
Executive: Agar isme kar rahe hai to add product mein ja ke ye same name se add kar dijiye sir product. 
Customer: Lekin jo lekin jo hamare liye product hai jo humne select kar rakhe hai ready mix concrete plant aur asphalt hot mix plant inki leads kyu nahi chal rahi hai inke regarding humne select hi nahi kar rakha. 
Executive: Dekho sir mai bata hu selected hai ye sara ye aap agar aapko confusion hai to aap products pe jayenge more option aata hai usme product categories hai aap dekhoge yahi do categories aapki selected hoti hai hota kya hai mai aapko bata deta hu pehle kya tha sir apna jo promotion tha wo 10 cities mein tha theek hai abhi humne kya kara aapka India page ka listing ka service ka hua hai theek isme kya hota hai starting mein jaise hi aapka abhi live hua hai kuch din pehle hi aapne dekha bhi hoga hai na to hota kya hai ki sir starting phase mein wohi mai aapko us din group pe hi bata raha tha ki starting phase mein hame jo bhi leads aapke pass category jo aapki hai related usko hame consume karna padta hai pehle listing bane theek hai abhi mai aapko jaise hi aapki har cities mein listing aayegi to automatically sir inquiries ka flow rate aana increase hota hai aap samajh rahe ho isi vajah se mai aapko us din bhi keh raha tha ki sir isko na jitna jyada aap consumption ho gaya ya fir inquiry pe revert ho gaya ya fir I am interested mark karna ho gaya wo category ke regarding kariye lekin jaise humne dono product select kar rakhe hai jo bhi sir jab bhi mai search jaise maine asphalt hot mix plant search kar raha hu as per current selection. 
Customer: Hmm hmm. 
Customer: We are unable to show any relevant value. 
Executive: Ruko sir mai ek ek aad lead dekhta hu kya hua matlab ki sir aaj abhi tak koi requirement is particular category mein post nahi hui. 
Customer: Nahi abhi tak aayi nahi hogi. 
Executive: Wohi matlab ye hai isliye usme nahi dikh raha hai ek second rukiye mai kuch check kar raha hu.

Executive: Sir ye lead to kafi hai matlab ye apan ko show nahi hui kya dekhiye kitni leads aap ek bar past leads pe jaoge asphalt ke regarding kafi aayi thi 19 ghante pehle kal bhi ek aayi hai Mirzapur se Gorakhpur se ek GST verified thi.

Customer: Ye past lead mein matlab ki koi selective nahi karna koi product ka naam nahi dalna. 
Executive: Haan. 
Customer: Sold out aa rahi hai sari. 
Executive: Matlab sold out ka matlab nahi sold out ka matlab ye ho gaya ki sir ya fir humse miss ho gayi ye humne us time dekha nahi jab aayi ye hota hai matlab ye requirement post. 
Customer: Wahi matlab ye 19 ghante pehle aisa bhi ho sakta hai kal to Sunday tha kal aapka off bhi raha hoga. 
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. 
Customer: Hai na. 
Customer: Ha teen minute 40 minute kal pass tha. 
Executive: Ha to is vajah se sir wo matlab so nahi kyuki ye jo category aapki isme hai na wo order value bahut high aati hai to apan ko leads dekhna rahega to isme to isme I am interested kar do koi issue to nahi hai isme. 
Executive: Ha nahi nahi wo kariye sir wo jyada jaruri hai.
Executive: Baki mai aapko na check kar leta hu aapko screenshot bhej deta hu jaise agar mujhe koi lead dikhti hai iske regarding hai na to sir thoda sa na aapko thoda sa active hona bas jaruri hai sir is category mein dekho leads aayi humse miss ho gayi. 
Customer: Ha wo isi vajah se dekho na kal ki do teen lead abhi aur mai screenshot bhejunga kal parso aapko 100% lead dikhegi wo. 
Executive: Aap ek kam aisa kiya karo jaise hi aap system pe aate ho na sabse pehle asphalt aur ye aapki ready mix concrete plant jo hai usko directly search kiya karo bas nahi dikhta hai to fir usko hata ke normal jo category self concrete ho gaya baki ho unko search kar liya karo. 
Customer: Hmm hmm bilkul sahi. 
Customer: Chaliye dekhte hai koi. 
Executive: Ha bilkul bilkul mai aur batata hu aapko isme. 
Customer: Ji bilkul. 
Executive: Okay. 
Executive: Chalo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads not showing for selected products.

- Wants leads for asphalt hot mix plant.

- Leads consumed, but no product addition.



Resolution:

- Executive explained listing process and category selection.

- Advised to mark 'I am interested' on leads.

- Executive will send screenshots of relevant leads.

- Advised to search directly for asphalt and concrete plant.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, asphalt, concrete, product category
